# KRAKEN CLAUDE - PRINT FILE CONVERSION INSTRUCTIONS

## Generated Files:
1. kraken-claude-front.html - HTML template for PNG conversion
2. kraken-claude-ascii.txt - Simple ASCII version
3. kraken-claude-front.svg - Vector format (scalable)

## CONVERTING TO PNG (300 DPI for Printful):

### Option 1: Using Online Tool (Easiest)
1. Go to: https://www.iloveimg.com/convert-to-jpg/svg-to-jpg
2. Upload: kraken-claude-front.svg
3. Convert to PNG (set to 4500x5400px or 300 DPI)
4. Download and use for Printful

### Option 2: Using Canva (Recommended)
1. Sign up at: https://www.canva.com/ (free)
2. Create custom size: 15" x 18" (or 4500 x 5400 px at 300 DPI)
3. Import kraken-claude-front.svg
4. Adjust colors/sizing as needed
5. Download as PNG (300 DPI)
6. Upload to Printful

### Option 3: Using Browser Screenshot
1. Open kraken-claude-front.html in Chrome
2. Press F12 (Developer Tools)
3. Toggle device toolbar (mobile view)
4. Set dimensions: 1500 x 1800
5. Right-click â†’ "Capture screenshot"
6. Upscale to 4500 x 5400 px using:
   - https://www.upscale.media/ (AI upscaler)
   - Or Adobe Photoshop (Image > Image Size > 300 DPI)

## PRINTFUL UPLOAD:
1. Go to: https://www.printful.com/dashboard/file-library
2. Click "Upload files"
3. Upload your 300 DPI PNG file
4. Use in product designer

## DESIGN DIMENSIONS:

### T-Shirt Front:
- Size: 12" x 16" (3600 x 4800 px @ 300 DPI)
- Format: PNG with transparent background
- Colors: RGB mode

### Sticker:
- Size: 3" x 3" (900 x 900 px @ 300 DPI + 0.125" bleed)
- Format: PNG with transparent background

### Mug (Full Wrap):
- Size: 8.25" x 3.85" (2475 x 1155 px @ 300 DPI)
- Format: PNG
- Note: Wrap design around mug template

### Hoodie Back:
- Size: 12" x 16" (3600 x 4800 px @ 300 DPI)
- Format: PNG with transparent background

## COLOR CODES:
- Cyan: #00D9FF
- Orange: #FF6B35
- White: #FFFFFF
- Navy: #001F3F

## QUESTIONS?
Contact Printful Support: support@printful.com
